mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_ID, REGION_NAME, DOG_SPECIES, DOG_SIZE, TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATED_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, GATHERING_DATE, DELETED FROM (SELECT rownum rn, ID, USER_ID, REGION_NAME, DOG_SPECIES, DOG_SIZE, TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATED_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, GATHERING_DATE, DELETED FROM (SELECT post.id, post.user_id, region.region_name, member.nickname, post.deleted, species.dog_species, dog_size.dog_size, post.title, post.created_date, post.view_count, post.gathering_date FROM dog_gather_post_tb post, user_tb member, region_tb region, dog_species_tb species, dog_size_tb dog_size WHERE post.id > 0 and post.user_id = member.id and post.region_id = region.id and post.species_id = species.id and species.size_id = dog_size.id ORDER BY post.id DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
